docs.title: Summary
docs.text: I’ve always been a hands-on person, with an overarching pursuit for excellent delivery and proper feedback between my clients and colleagues. To achieve this in these last 10 years, I’ve worked with several industries, to learn what led them further and what were their woes: from a Food Manufacturing plant and their specific requirements; to a wind turbine construction site abroad and their multi-cultural, multi-asset team; to planning electronic safety mechanisms and preparing homeland security solutions to a wide range of customers; to maintaining and improving a management platform for Renewable generators through a multitude of protocols, automations and custom client requests; to maintaining APIs for a british FinTech; to API gateways and their cloud infrastructure on Insurance and, now, moving beyond to AI architecture on Telco.
